segments.text: This is the Pan-American Club . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I believe you have a luncheon meeting this coming Wednesday . Could you give me some more information about that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . The guest speaker is Professor David of a University , and he'll be lecturing about The impact of the Oil Crisis on Latin America .
segments.speaker: S1
